cmCourseInfo.description: This course will survey historical, cultural, and textual contexts for Buddhist meditative and contemplative practices and techniques.
cmCourseInfo.title: The History of Buddhist Meditation

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Delivery Instructions

This is an online, asynchronous course. All of the lectures will be pre-recorded and posted according to the course schedule. Students will have the opportunity for weekly online class discussions and the opportunity for synchronous contact with the professors and teaching assistants through real-time online office hours to ask questions and clarifications about course content and assignments. Students need the ability to view PDFs or PowerPoint slides and to access online library resources and Quercus tools, including Bb Collaborate and Microsoft Teams.
